title: Tin Foil Hat #38:  Hollow Moon with John Tole
description:
Thank you for tuning into another Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. Get ready for one of the best episodes yet. Join Ryan and Sam as they welcome hilarious comedian John Tole to the show to promote his new album "Pre Existing Condition" and hear why he believes the Moon is hollow. On this episode we discuss...
1) Moon Science
2)Flat Earth
3) Moon Echoes
4) The Proselenes A Time Before There Was A Moon
5) A Weird Orbit
6)The Lunar Bridge
7) We read your iTunes reviews

Please check out Tin Foil Hat on the inter web
1) AllComedyTshirts.com
2) Twitter.com at @Madhatter39ers
3) Instagram at @TinFoilHatpod
4)Reddit at Reddit.com/TinFoilHatshow
5)Youtube.com at youtube.com/SamTripoli
